editorialNotes.standard: Miniclipâ€™s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.Â
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!
You've got one Golden Shot for massive prizes.

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a football star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldnâ€™t be simplerâ€”simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.

ios.subtitle: Feel the Drive of a Real Race!

editorialNotes.standard: Eden Gamesâ€™ highly polished racer impresses us more each time we play. The cars handle beautifully, the scenic tracks are gorgeous, and these quick races are perfect for drivers on the go. Our favourite features? Maybe the ability to rewind time and undo brief mishapsâ€”or the deep customisation options that let you trick out your garage along with your rides.

Super Stickman Golf 3 has 20 new coursesâ€¦ and thatâ€™s enough to sell anyone whoâ€™s played the series before. But if you havenâ€™tâ€”or you think golf is boringâ€”youâ€™re in for a treat. Fantastic levels, loads of collectible power-ups and some seriously fun multiplayer modesâ€”theyâ€™re all tucked into a wonderfully casual, arcadey package. Itâ€™s everything weâ€™ve come to expect from Super Stickman Golfâ€”just better.
editorialNotes.short: Tee off on challenging courses without embarrassing yourself in front of your friends.
